spots.name: Red Obelisk Cave
spots.description: This is a smaller cave that may be better suited for solo players or those looking for a quick place to set up shop.

spots.name: Westtern Cave
spots.description: As seen below, you'll come to this waterfall. Enter through the middle of the fall or the smaller falls at the base of the structure. Once you get inside there's lots of space, but you'll need to be careful about ensuring those pathways are thoroughly guarded. Not only is the open area great for breeding, but there's also an underwater cave inside this cave, making it perfect for aquatic tames.

spots.name: Spider Cave
spots.description: If you want a much bigger cave that's also close to lots of resources go here. There are winding paths that go on forever in multiple directions. It should be noted that this is one of the big Artifact Caves you'll need to head towards if you want to conquer Valguero's boss. Be aware that you'll need scuba gear too because there's tons of water here.

spots.name: Temple Cave
spots.description: This is the second Artifact Cave you'll need to make your way through if beating the boss is your goal.

spots.name: Abberation Zone Cave
spots.description: If you're hunting for Aberration creatures, this is where you'll find them.

spots.name: Ice Cave
spots.description: This is a narrow ice cave with an artifact inside.

spots.name: Solid Hiding Spot
spots.description: This is a small, narrow cave network that will keep you concealed from enemies or Dinos.

spots.name: Under castle cave
spots.description: There's a massive breeding cave in this area with plenty of water.
